arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel stun Augsburg with clinical display to boost survival hopes
arts.sum: After last weekend's morale-boosting victory against Borussia Mönchengladbach, Kiel showed real grit to add a triumph at Augsburg to their battle for survival, with Alexander Bernhardsson's double and Shuto Machino's 11th goal of the campaign proving invaluable to the visitors. Augsburg continued to create chances, with Alexis Claude-Maurice particularly lively, but Dähne produced a series of outstanding saves to maintain Kiel's three-goal advantage.

arts.ttl: Kiel stun Augsburg to reignite survival hopes
arts.sum: Marcel Rapp's side sealed a much-needed 3-1 win at the WWK-Arena this afternoon.

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Holstein Kiel preview: Augsburg looking for revenge
arts.sum: Augsburg will be out for revenge after their heavy 5-1 defeat to Holstein Kiel earlier this season, as Marcel Rapp's relegation-threatened side visit WWK-Arena on Sunday desperate to pick up vital points in their fight for survival.

arts.ttl: Preview: Augsburg vs. Holstein Kiel - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and Holstein Kiel, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
